page.title: 12People's Jobs.
page.content: People in Crawford have a variety of jobs.Some people work locally and others have to travel miles every day to get to work.People working in Glasgow,Hamilton and Edinburgh have to get up early in the morning to get to work.Some people who are lorry drivers have to travel a very long way each day.Many people in Crawford work in the local hotels and cafes.Other people are tradesmen and Sales Representatives.There are also some professional people who travel out of Crawford each day to work as surgeons, chartered accountants and teachers. Other people in the village work as policemen,postmen,Regional Council Workers and farmworkers as well as many other jobs.
